name: Mars Expedition
description:
An adventure, platformer, action, shooter game.

story:

You are an astronaut who has crashed on the Mars. Your mission is to defeat three evil aliens who are guarding a piece of a spaceship. If you can defeat them, you can escape from the planet.

buggs:

!the first boss( the slime one) doesn't work if you don't press the "clear data" button in the settings

the second boss(the tnt one) can be cheated

if you jump to a slope it will throw you up

Other bugs can occur, the save game system does not work in this environment(this is the first bug) and zip-line mechanics has many bugs. One planned mechanic was completely missed out this would have been a grappling hook.

Made by Pupak Games (hungray)

Daniel Farkas I

Daniel Farkas II

Peter Szalai

Thanks for playing!
